channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: AppSource
item.description: Test & purchase AppSource The app is available in the Microsoft AppSource. After downloading, a user can use the App completely free. In case that more Users want to use the function, you can simply order more licenses via our form. Your costs: Subscription incl. maintenance* 6,90€/User Subscription incl. maintenance* 8,30€/User We reserve the right to change prices in the event of functional enhancements. To the form Connector 365 Easy Document Pin is available for the following BC licensing:

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Test & Purchase OnPrem Test You have the possibility to test our Connector 365 Easy Document Pin App without obligation or to purchase it directly. For this we need some information from you. To the form If you wish a test phase, you will receive the desired objects for one user and for a test period of 30 days. Before the end of the test period, we will contact you to take over the purchase or deactivate the test phase.
